title: Will OMEN ever be released?
body: I remember back in the day when OMEN was going to come out but got cancelled, so will he ever come out in the future?

replies.body: You mean "I saw gbay's video about Omen and made a thread about it"
Haven't seen gbays video so i'll go check it out
It's incredibly unlikely we'll go back to Omen. He was never finished and there are a lot of other champion concepts we believe are better choices to put the time into instead.
Wow thanks Riot for responding, I thought you never would :)
Welcome! I try and drop by the Oce forums every so often to see what's going on here (apologies this reply's so late).

Sweet nice to hear from you :D. All that's going on in OCE at the moment (or maybe just for me) is that we are waiting for a Singed Buff / Rework since no one plays him, and all the other old champs are getting reworks :(

AO SHIN
AO SHIN
AO SHIN
AO SHIN
*continues chanting at front of rito buildingz*

> It's incredibly unlikely we'll go back to Omen. He was never finished and there are a lot of other champion concepts we believe are better choices to put the time into instead.

Wasn't Omen turned into Yorrick? I feel as if it was.

he was put in the "to die" picture by rito, so unlikely

Also, udyr killed him in the fight b4 ao shin came out, he was 1 of the little monster thingies
maybe omen got made in rek sai idk
All I care about is Ao Shin
